name: Smash The Eggs
description:
Destroy the Eggs before a new chicken is born. If there are more than 30 chickens on screen, game over. It is based on a game seen on a children tv show. 

This is my first app so help me improve it :).

Credits:
Sounds: https://freesound.org
Images: https://pixabay.com, Marcos Lizondo and me

Keywords: Children, Addictive, Fun
